p: To inspect the state of international collaborations in emerging virus research, we mapped academic institutions to geolocation. However, it is not a trivial task to match institution names. Institution names are sometimes written differently; e.g., Aalborg University Hospital and Aalborg University are affiliated. However, there are cases where 2 similar names refer to different institutions; e.g., the University of Washington and Washington University are entirely different institutions.
